question: Which country hosts the defence exercises ‘NAVDEX 21’ and ‘IDEX 21’, which are to be participated by the Indian Navy?
explanation:
Annual naval defence and maritime security exhibitions NAVDEX and IDEX are to be scheduled in the United Arab Emirates.
Indian Naval ship Pralaya arrived at Abu Dhabi in the United Arab Emirates to participate in the exercises from February 20 to February 25. INS Pralaya is the second ship of the indigenously built Prabal Class Missile Vessels.
